description: Stefan L. Maverick, grandfather of http://anidb.net/ch13447 [Lebia Maverick], was one of the leading scientists in Tokyo. He discovered the http://anidb.net/ch25999 [visioneers]; he`s also the builder of the Cyclotron, and as such participant in the "http://anidb.net/ch25784 [Project Gaia]".
name: Stefan L. Maverick
